Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • TaskList

  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jack Protivnak TaskList contains a list of tasks and operations for that list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskList()
      Create a new TaskList from scratch.
      TaskList(java.lang.String filename, java.text.DateFormat format)
      Create a new TaskList from disk, reading from provided filename.
